name: Exit84
description:
The King has finally found it! What he was looking for all these years! Rejoice! The only problem is: its on the dangerous planet B-84! Your duty is to retrieve it for him, no matter the cost! Type your way into the dangerous asteroid, avoiding lasers and bullets with the help of your trusty coordinate reader. One second could make the difference between death or EXIT.
Controls
Your keyboard.
How to play
Type into the console the coordinates that appear on the screen to move on, and press Enter to transport your character to that position.
Credits
a game by Bhérring Paucar Bonifacio (@probe_31)
music by Álvaro Fernández
Mentions
